title: Mozilla Firefox 1.0.x - JavaScript Handler Race Condition Memory Corruption
description: Concurrency vulnerability in Mozilla Firefox 1.5.0.6 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via multiple Javascript timed events that load a deeply nested XML file, followed by redirecting the browser to another page, which leads to a concurrency failure that causes structures to be freed incorrectly, as demonstrated by (1) ffoxdie and (2) ffoxdie3.  NOTE: it has been reported that Netscape 8.1 and K-Meleon 1.0.1 are also affected by ffoxdie.  Mozilla confirmed to CVE that ffoxdie and ffoxdie3 trigger the same underlying vulnerability.  NOTE: it was later reported that Firefox 2.0 RC2 and 1.5.0.7 are also affected.

title: vmware rabbitmq 在web页面生成时对输入的转义处理不恰当（跨站脚本）
description: RabbitMQ is a multi-protocol messaging broker. In rabbitmq-server prior to version 3.8.18, when a federation link was displayed in the RabbitMQ management UI via the `rabbitmq_federation_management` plugin, its consumer tag was rendered without proper <script> tag sanitization. This potentially allows for JavaScript code execution in the context of the page. The user must be signed in and have elevated permissions (manage federation upstreams and policies) for this to occur. The vulnerability is patched in RabbitMQ 3.8.18. As a workaround, disable the `rabbitmq_federation_management` plugin and use [CLI tools](https://www.rabbitmq.com/cli.html) instead.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: google tensorflow 跨界内存读
description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. In affected versions if the arguments to `tf.raw_ops.RaggedGather` don't determine a valid ragged tensor code can trigger a read from outside of bounds of heap allocated buffers. The [implementation](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/8d72537c6abf5a44103b57b9c2e22c14f5f49698/tensorflow/core/kernels/ragged_gather_op.cc#L70) directly reads the first dimension of a tensor shape before checking that said tensor has rank of at least 1 (i.e., it is not a scalar). Furthermore, the implementation does not check that the list given by `params_nested_splits` is not an empty list of tensors. We have patched the issue in GitHub commit a2b743f6017d7b97af1fe49087ae15f0ac634373. The fix will be included in TensorFlow 2.6.0. We will also cherrypick this commit on TensorFlow 2.5.1, TensorFlow 2.4.3, and TensorFlow 2.3.4, as these are also affected and still in supported range.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: Cisco IOS XR Border Gateway Protocol TCP Connection Restart 拒绝服务漏洞
description: Cisco IOS XR软件中边界网关协议（BGP）功能实施中的漏洞可能允许未经身份验证的远程攻击者在受影响的系统上导致拒绝服务（DoS）条件。该漏洞是由于某些BGP更新消息的不正确处理引起的。攻击者可以通过发送BGP更新消息来利用此漏洞，该消息包括一组特定的属性，将由受影响的系统处理。成功的利用可能使攻击者导致BGP进程意外重新启动，从而导致DoS条件。思科的BGP实现仅接受来自明确定义的对等方的传入BGP通信。要利用此漏洞，恶意的BGP更新消息可能需要来自已配置的有效BGP对等方，或者需要由攻击者在与BGP对等方的现有有效TCP连接上注入到受害者的BGP网络中。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接：

title: GNU Wget缓冲区溢出漏洞
description: 在处理OK响应时调用retr.c:fd_read_body()函数。当响应在1.19.2之前以块的形式在wget中发送时，块解析器使用strtol()读取每个块的长度，但不检查块的长度是否为非负数。然后，代码尝试使用MIN()宏以8192字节为单位读取块，但是最终将负块长度传递给retr.c:fd_read()。当fd_read()接受一个int参数时，块长度的高32位被丢弃，留下fd_read()一个完全由攻击者控制的长度参数。攻击者可以在分配缓冲区之后破坏malloc元数据。
solution:
厂商已发布漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/wget/

cwe.cwe_description: 内存缓冲区边界内操作的限制不恰当

cPanel是美国cPanel公司的一套基于Web的自动化主机托管平台。该平台主要用于自动化管理网站和服务器。

cPanel 59.9999.145之前版本中的WHM tail_upcp2.cgi界面存在跨站脚本漏洞。该漏洞源于WEB应用缺少对客户端数据的正确验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行客户端代码。
solution: 目前厂商已发布升级补丁以修复漏洞，补丁获取链接：https://documentation.cpanel.net/display/CL/60+Change+Log

PCS 8.3R1版本中的diag.cgi文件存在跨站请求伪造漏洞，该漏洞源于程序未能对函数执行跨站请求伪造保护。远程攻击者可通过诱使管理员访问恶意的跨站请求伪造页面利用该漏洞执行命令。
solution:
厂商尚未提供漏洞修复方案，请关注厂商主页更新：

title: Apache Tomcat 5.5.15 - cal2.jsp Cross-Site Scripting

NOTE: this may be related to CVE-2006-0254.1.

title: Mozilla Firefox/SeaMonkey/Thunderbird堆缓冲区溢出漏洞（CNVD-2012-3038）
description: Mozilla Firefox/SeaMonkey/Thunderbird是Mozilla所发布的WEB浏览器/新闻组客户端/邮件客户端。Mozilla Firefox及Mozilla产品使用的utf16_to_isolatin1函数存在一个基于堆的缓冲区溢出漏洞，通过引发字符集转换失败(如从Unicode转换为本地字符集)可触发此漏洞，攻击者构建恶意WEB页，诱使用户解析，可使应用程序崩溃或可以以应用程序上下文执行任意代码。
solution: Mozilla Thunderbird 13.0、Mozilla Thunderbird ESR 10.0.5、Mozilla SeaMonkey 2.10和Mozilla Firefox 13.0、Mozilla Firefox ESR 10.0.5已经修复此漏洞，建议用户下载使用：http://www.mozilla.org
